      • classic

        public static JkJavaProjectStructure classic(java.io.File baseDir,
                                             java.io.File outputDir)
        Deprecated. 
        Creates a classic Java project structure according specified base and output directory. All others locations are inferred from these two values.

      • classic

        public static JkJavaProjectStructure classic(java.io.File baseDir,
                                             java.lang.String outputDirRelatedPath)
        Deprecated. 
        Creates a classic Java project structure according specified base and output related path to the base directory. All others locations are inferred from these two values.

      • classic

        public static JkJavaProjectStructure classic(java.io.File baseDir)
        Deprecated. 
        Creates a classic Java project structure according specified base directory, the output directory relative path to base directory is 'build/output". All others locations are inferred from this value.

      • deleteOutputDirs

        public void deleteOutputDirs()
        Deprecated. 
        Delete dirs all directories involved in outpout production (classes, test classes, test reports, generated sources/resources) but not the outputDir.
